DEMO_976_MSG_002: ́Do you remember the data you found at the Transmission Facility? I finished analyzing it!
DEMO_976_MSG_003:
́It was a broken search program so I fixed it up!
ā
DEMO_976_MSG_004: ́I'll send it to you now so press the START button on your reactor screen and activiate it!
DEMO_976_MSG_005:
́That's the search apparatus, a drone with the latest camera built in.
ā
You can control it from afar and see what's out there with the camera so it's great to use in dangerous places!
ā
The only downside is that it'll fall after runnig into things 3 times. So if you want to use it for a long peiod, be very careful.
ā
It'll alert you on the screen when it's near an obstacle so make use of that.
DEMO_976_MSG_006:
́And also.... I added a nifty feature where it can collect items!
ā
DEMO_976_MSG_007:
́Could you take it for a test drive and try collecting 10
 Power of the Sky ? You can only get them up high.
